sentence.text: To date, over 150 disease-associated variants in heterophilic cell-cell adhesion via plasma membrane cell adhesion molecules have been described, resulting in a range of retinal disease phenotypes including Leber congenital amaurosis and retinitis pigmentosa.

entity.text: heterophilic cell-cell adhesion via plasma membrane cell adhesion molecules

sentence.text: We performed a retrospective review of electronic patient records to identify patients with macular dystrophy due to bi-allelic variants in heterophilic cell-cell adhesion via plasma membrane cell adhesion molecules.

entity.text: heterophilic cell-cell adhesion via plasma membrane cell adhesion molecules
